title: PEARL Twill Tape, 36 yd, White
description: Our twill tape is 100% cotton and is preshrunk. It features a herringbone pattern. You can use it as a simple binding. You can also use it to stabilize seams, especially on knit fabrics to keep the seam from stretching out of place. Also makes sturdy ties.
